document_data.caption: A map of [[Hartsvale]], showing Lake Woe to the south, with the [[Lake Woe mountain|mountain]] in its center.
document_data.name: Lake Woe
document_data.mainbody: '''Lake Woe''' was a large lake in [[the North]].
document_data.Description: The lake was full of ice and covered in a thick mist that drifted down from the [[Lake Woe mountain|massive mountain at its center]].
document_data.Geography:
The lake was located south of the [[Ice Spires|Ice Spires South]]<ref group="note">[[Lake Woe]] is not labelled on any map, but its description places it south of the [[Ice Spires|Ice Spires South]], and only one lake on the maps fits that description.

Mount Woe, one of the tallest mountains in northern [[Faer√ªn]], was at its center.
